subject: Last CFP - Malasyisa - Nov. 17-19, 2014
from: "The Third World Congress on Computing & Information Technology (WCIT2014)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU |
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
Dear Colleague:

You are invited to participate in The Third World Congress on Computing & Information Technology (WCIT2014)  

Location: Malaysia - Kuala Lumpor - Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation 

Dates: Nov. 17-19, 2014

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/third-wcit/
+-----------------------------------------------------------+

The WCIT2014 Congress contains of the following six conferences:

The International Conference on Computer Graphics, Multimedia and Image Processing (CGMIP2014)

The International Conference on Data Mining, Internet Computing, and Big Data (BigData2014)

The International Conference on Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and Education Technologies (CSCEET2014)

The International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Pattern Recognition (AIPR2014)

The International Conference on Cyber-Crime Investigation and Cyber Security (ICCICS2014)

The International Conference on Electrical, Electronics, Computer Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2014)


+-----------------------------------------------------------+

Submission Dates: Open until Oct. 17, 2014

Congress Dates: Nov. 17-19, 2014

For more details, please visit www.sdiwc.net


----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
